alert.note: Alert for Henry; Rock Island (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 2:22AM CDT until August 01 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ROCK ISLAND AND HENRY COUNTIES... At 221 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Osco, or near Cambridge, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Moline, East Moline, Cambridge, Silvis, Geneseo, Colona, Coal Valley, Orion, Atkinson, Andover, Cleveland, Lynn Center, Warner, Dayton, Carbon Cliff, Osco, Henry County Fairgrounds, Silvis Heights, Sunny Hill Estates and Sunny Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
